publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2742 Margaret Jamieson: M77 Extension—That the Parliament welcomes the opening on 27 April 2005 of the M77 extension from Malletsheugh to Fenwick and looks forward to the benefits to the economy of Ayrshire which will result from the links to the motorway network and to safe travel for those who travel the route. Supported by: Bill Butler*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Cathy Peattie*, Michael McMahon*, Elaine Smith*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Cathie Craigie*, Trish Godman*, Maureen Macmillan*, Christine May*, Jackie Baillie*

S2M-2742 Margaret Jamieson:M77 Extension—That the Parliament welcomes the opening on 27 April 2005 of the M77 extension from Malletsheugh to Fenwick and looks forward to the benefits to the economy of Ayrshire which will result from the links to the motorway network and to safe travel for those who travel the route. Supported by: Bill Butler, Ms Wendy Alexander, Cathy Peattie, Michael McMahon, Elaine Smith, Mr Frank McAveety, Cathie Craigie, Trish Godman, Maureen Macmillan, Christine May, Jackie Baillie, Scott Barrie*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-2742 M77 Extension (lodged on 28 April 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2742 M77 Extension (lodged on 28 April 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2742 M77 Extension (lodged on 28 April 2005) Irene Oldfather*
